title: ADC keeps running around by himself getting killed by Rengar over and over.
body:
Even though i told him 6 or 7 times to stop running off by himself and would ping him back. 

Of course instead of ADC accepting that he is spoon feeding him kills by refusing to group he just blames Rengar being OP.

Plot twist, when ADC finally grouped we hit Rengar with 1 stun killed rengar instantly cleaned up his team and won the game without a single casualty.

TL:DR stop running around by yourself as a squishy and wondering why assassins are getting fed off of you.
